title: Procurement for the supply of HLA Molecular Testing Reagents
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Minister of Healthcare and Indigenous Medical Services to award the procurement for the supply of HLA Molecular Testing Reagents used for ensuring the  safety in Organ Transplantation, to M/s Emar Pharma (Pvt.) Ltd. at a total cost of Rs.230.69 million (without VAT) as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
